Publications

Journal

  1. Draelos, Anne, Pranjal Gupta, Na Young Jun, Chaichontat Sriworarat, and John Pearson. 2021. “Bubblewrap: Online tiling and real-time flow prediction on neural manifolds.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 34.

  3. Zhao, Lingfei, Ethan G Arnault, Alexey Bondarev, Andrew Seredinski, Trevyn FQ Larson, Anne W Draelos, Hengming Li, et al. 2020. “Interference of chiral Andreev edge states.” Nature Physics 16 (8): 862–67.
  4. Draelos, Anne, Eva A Naumann, and John M Pearson. 2020. “Online neural connectivity estimation with ensemble stimulation.” ArXiv Preprint ArXiv:2007.13911.
  5. Draelos, Anne, and John Pearson. 2020. “Online Neural Connectivity Estimation with Noisy Group Testing.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 33.

  7. Draelos, AW, A Silverman, B Eniwaye, EG Arnault, CT Ke, MT Wei, I Vlassiouk, IV Borzenets, F Amet, and G Finkelstein. 2019. “Subkelvin lateral thermal transport in diffusive graphene.” Physical Review B 99 (12): 125427.
  8. Wei, MT, AW Draelos, A Seredinski, CT Ke, H Li, Y Mehta, K Watanabe, et al. 2019. “Chiral quasiparticle tunneling between quantum Hall edges in proximity with a superconductor.” Physical Review B 100 (12): 121403.
  9. Seredinski, Andrew, Anne W Draelos, Ethan G Arnault, Ming-Tso Wei, Hengming Li, Tate Fleming, Kenji Watanabe, Takashi Taniguchi, François Amet, and Gleb Finkelstein. 2019. “Quantum Hall–based superconducting interference device.” Science Advances 5 (9): eaaw8693.
  10. Ke, CT, AW Draelos, A Seredinski, MT Wei, H Li, M Hernandez-Rivera, K Watanabe, et al. 2019. “Anomalous periodicity of magnetic interference patterns in encapsulated graphene Josephson junctions.” Physical Review Research 1 (3): 033084.
  11. Seredinski, Andrew, Anne Draelos, Ming-Tso Wei, Chung-Ting Ke, Tate Fleming, Yash Mehta, Ethan Mancil, et al. 2018. “Supercurrent in Graphene Josephson Junctions with Narrow Trenches in the Quantum Hall Regime.” MRS Advances 3 (47-48): 2855–64.
  12. Draelos, Anne, Ming-Tso Wei, Andrew Seredinski, Chung-Ting Ke, Hengming Li, Yash Mehta, Ethan Mancil, et al. 2018. “Supercurrent in Multi-Terminal Ballistic Graphene Josephson Junctions.” Bulletin of the American Physical Society.
  13. Draelos, Anne W, Ming Tso Wei, Andrew Seredinski, Chung Ting Ke, Yash Mehta, Russell Chamberlain, Kenji Watanabe, et al. 2018. “Investigation of supercurrent in the quantum Hall regime in graphene Josephson junctions.” Journal of Low Temperature Physics 191 (5): 288–300.
  14. Draelos, Anne, Chung-Ting Ke, Ivan Borzenets, Ming-Tso Wei, Andrew Seredenski, Kenji Watanabe, Takashi Taniguchi, et al. 2017. “Robust 4π periodicity in ballistic graphene Josephson junctions.” Bulletin of the American Physical Society 62.
  15. Borzenets, Ivan, Francois Amet, Chung Ting Ke, Anne Draelos, Kenji Watanabe, Takashi Taniguchi, Yuriy Bomze, Gleb Finkelstain, Michihisa Yamamoto, and Seigo Tarucha. 2017. “Governing energies of graphene Josephson junctions from dirty to ultra-clean regimes.” SUPERSTRIPES, 191.
  16. Borzenets, IV, F Amet, CT Ke, AW Draelos, MT Wei, A Seredinski, K Watanabe, et al. 2016. “Ballistic Graphene Josephson Junctions from the Short to the Long Junction Regimes.” Physical Review Letters 117 (23): 237002.
  17. “Critical Current Scaling in Long Diffusive Graphene-Based Josephson Junctions.” 2016. Nano Letters 16 (8): 4788–91.
  18. Watson, Anne M, Xiao Zhang, Rodrigo Alcaraz de la Osa, Juan Marcos Sanz, Francisco González, Fernando Moreno, Gleb Finkelstein, Jie Liu, and Henry O Everitt. 2015. “Rhodium Nanoparticles for Ultraviolet Plasmonics.” Nano Letters 15 (2): 1095–1100.
  19. Watson, Anne, Mauricio Pilo-Pais, Steven Demers, Thom LaBean, and Gleb Finkelstein. 2014. “SERS Plasmonic Enhancement using DNA Origami-based Complex Metallic Nanostructures.” Bulletin of the American Physical Society.
  20. Gann, Eliot, Anne Watson, John R Tumbleston, Justin Cochran, Hongping Yan, Cheng Wang, Jaewook Seok, Michael Chabinyc, and Harald Ade. 2014. “Topographic measurement of buried thin-film interfaces using a grazing resonant soft x-ray scattering technique.” Physical Review B 90 (24): 245421.
  21. Pilo-Pais, Mauricio, A Watson, Steven Demers, Thomas H LaBean, and Gleb Finkelstein. 2014. “Surface-Enhanced Raman Scattering Plasmonic Enhancement Using DNA Origami-Based Complex Metallic Nanostructures.” Nano Letters 14 (4): 2099–2104.
  22. Shinn, Michelle, Stephen Benson, George Neil, Anne Watson, Peter van der Slot, and Ramin Lalezari. 2010. “Modeling and Operation of an Edge-Outcoupled Free-Electron Laser.” Talk TUOC3 FEL2010.
